alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 2:03PM CDT until June 15 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Monroe County in south central Alabama... Central Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 202 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leroy, or near Jackson, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jackson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama.
